LanguageData.WG_StructurePoint.Tooltip:
The overall hit point of the frame. this can absorb incoming damage and protect the pilot without getting injured, but if this value is 25% of the max point, it will have a chance to directly damage the pilot.

If the Point down to zero, the frame will get destoryed and trapping the pilot in the wreckage. 

To recover the structure point, you need to dock the gantry and unload the modules, then pawn with crafting capability can repair its hitpoints.
